sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS To Be Held on May 9, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting of Shareholders of Loews Corporation will be held at the Loews Regency New York Hotel, 540 Park Avenue, Ne York, New York, on Tuesday, May 9, 2017, at 11:00 A.M., New York City time, for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To elect fourteen directors named in the accompanying proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To approve, on an advisory basis, the companys executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To hold an advisory vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ratify the appointment of the companys independent auditors for 2017; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To transact such other business as may properly come before the meeting or any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders of record at the close of business on March 16, 2017 are entitled to notice of and to vote at the meeting and any adjournment or postponement thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Marc A. Alpert Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dated:March 29, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PLEASE VOTE AS PROMPTLY AS POSSIBLE BY USING THE INTERNET OR TELEPHONE, OR IF YOU RECEIVED A PAPER COPY OF THE PROXY MATERIALS, BY SIGNING, DATING AND RETURNING THE PROXY CARD INCLUDED THEREWITH.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LOEWS CORPORATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are providing this Proxy Statement in connection with the solicitation by our Board of Directors (our Board) of proxies to be voted at our Annual Meeting of Shareholders (our Annual Meeting), which will be held at the Loews Regency New York Hotel, 540 Park Avenue, New York, New York, on Tuesday, May 9, 2017, at 11:00 A.M., New York City time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our mailing address is 667 Madison Avenue, New York, New York 10065-8087.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that throughout this Proxy Statement we refer to Loews Corporation as we, us, our, Loews or the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of March 16, 2017, the record date for determination of shareholders entitled to notice of and to vote at the Annual Meeting, there were 336,684,263 shares of our Common Stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each such outstanding share of our Common Stock is entitled to one vote on all matters that may come before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All proxies properly voted in accordance with the instructions set forth below prior to the Annual Meeting and not revoked will be voted at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy at any time before it is exercised by giving notice in writing to our Corporate Secretary, by granting a proxy bearing a later date or by voting in person at the Annua Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum will be present at the Annual Meeting if holders of a majority of the issued and outstanding shares of our Common Stock on the record date are represented at the Annual Meeting in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a quorum is not present at the Annual Meeting, we expect to postpone or adjourn the Annual Meeting to solicit additional proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes (as defined below) will be counted as shares present and entitled to vote for the purpose of determining whether a quorum is present.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares with respect to which a broker indicates that it does not have authority to vote on a matter will be considered broker non-votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes occur on a matter when a bank, broker or other nominee is not permitted by applicable regulatory requirements to vote on that matter without instruction from the owner of the shares and no instruction is given.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Absent instructions from you, your broker may vote your shares on the ratification of the appointment of our independent auditors (Proposal No. 4), but may not vote your shares on the election of directors (Proposal No. 1) or any of the other proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority Vote Standard for Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our by-laws provide that a nominee for director in an uncontested election, such as the election to be held at our Annual Meeting, will be elected to the Board by the vote of the majority of the votes cast with respect to such nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares that are voted to abstain with respect to any one or more nominees and broker non-votes will not be counted as votes cast and, therefore, will have no effect on the outcome of the voting for directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that an incumbent nominee does not receive a majority of the votes cast, our by-laws require that director to tender his or her resignation, and our Board to then establish a committee to consider whether to accept or reject that resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will act on the committees recommendation and publicly disclose its decision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Standard for Recommending the Frequency of Future Advisory Votes on Executive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of shares representing a majority of the votes cast by the holders of shares present and entitled to vote on the matter is required to approve the non-binding vote by shareholders (Proposal No. 3) on the frequency of future advisory votes on the compensation of the executive officers required to be named in our proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares that are voted to abstain with respect to this matter and broker non-votes will not be counted as votes cast and, therefore, will have no effect on the outcome of the voting for the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If none of the three frequency choices receives a majority of votes cast, our Board will consider the frequency that receives the plurality of votes cast as the recommendation of the shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes Required to Adopt Other Proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The affirmative vote of shares representing a majority of the votes cast by the holders of shares present and entitled to vote on the matter is required to approve each of the other proposals to be voted on at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares that are voted to abstain with respect to any one or more of these matters and broker non-votes will not be counted as votes cast and, therefore, will have no effect on the outcome of the voting for such proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting by Proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We expect to begin mailing to our shareholders proxy materials or an Important Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials (a Notice) containing instructions describing how to access our proxy materials, including this Proxy Statement and our Annual Report, and vote shares by the Internet or by telephone, on or about March 29, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you receive a Notice by mail you will not receive a printed copy of the proxy materials unless you specifically request it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the Annual Meeting, you may submit a proxy to vote your shares by the Internet, telephone or mail as more fully described below:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: by the Internet:  to submit your proxy by the Internet, go to www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the control number included on your proxy card, voter instruction form or Notice;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: by telephone:  to submit your proxy by telephone, shareholders of record should dial 1-800-690-6903 and follow the instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name, that is, you hold your shares in an account with a bank, broker or othe holder of record, you should dial the phone number listed on your voter instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the control numbe included on your proxy card, voter instruction form or Notice; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: by mail:  if you are a shareholder of record and received your Proxy Statement and Annual Report by mail, you can vote by signing, dating and completing the proxy card included therewith and returning it by mail in the enclosed self-addressed envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a Notice and wish to vote by traditional proxy card, you may receive a full set of the Annual Meeting materials at no charge through one of the following methods:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) by the Internet at: www.proxyvote.com;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) by telephone at: 1- 800-579-1639; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) by e-mail at sendmaterial@proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once you receive the Proxy Statement, Annual Report and proxy card, please sign, date and complete the proxy card and return it in the enclosed self-addressed envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No postage is necessary if the proxy card is mailed in the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares through a bank, broker or other nominee, it will give you separate instructions for voting your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting in Person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shareholders may vote in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also be represented by another person at the Annual Meeting by executing a proper proxy designating that person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name, you must obtain a valid legal proxy, executed in your favor, from your broker or other holder of record to be able to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Confidentiality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has adopted a policy of confidentiality regarding the voting of shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this policy, all proxies, ballots and voting tabulations that identify how an individual shareholder has voted at the Annual Meeting will be kept confidential from us, except where disclosure is required by applicable law, a shareholder expressly requests disclosure, or in the case of a contested proxy solicitation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy tabulators and inspectors of election will be employees of Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. or another third party and not our employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 16(a) Beneficial Ownership Reporting Compliance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based upon a review of filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission and written representations to us, we believe that during 2016 all of our directors and executive officers complied with the reporting requirements of Section 16(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the Exchange Act).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ELECTION OF DIRECTORS (Proposal No. 1)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has fixed the number of directors constituting the full Board at fourteen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, at the Annual Meeting, shareholders wil vote to elect a Board of fourteen directors to serve until the next annual meeting of shareholders and until their respective successors are duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the intention of the persons named in the accompanying form of proxy, unless you specify otherwise in your proxy, to vote for the election of the nominees named below, each of whom is now a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has no reason to believe that any of the persons named will be unable or unwilling to serve as a director and each has agreed to be nominated in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any nominee is unable or unwilling to serve, we anticipate that either proxies will be voted for the election of a substitute
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: nominee or nominees recommended by our Nominating and Governance Committee and approved by our
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and consistent with the proxy rules, or our Board will adopt a resolution reducing the number of directors constituting our full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information about each nominee for director and the nominees age, principal occupation during the past five years and other background information and individual qualifications and attributes are set forth below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless otherwise noted below, no entity related to a nominee is affiliated with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lawrence S. Bacow, 65  Fellow, Harvard College.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Bacow served as President-in-Residence of the Harvard Graduate School of Education from 2011 until 2014 and President of Tufts University from 2001 until 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Bacow is also a director of Henry Schein, Inc. and was a director of Boston Properties, Inc. from 2003 until 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has been a director of the Company since 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Bacows experience as an educator and as President of Tufts University, coupled with his experience as a consultant to a variety of companies and as a director of a public company provides him with a wealth of knowledge and experience which are valuable to our Board in its deliberations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ann E. Berman, 64  Retired advisor to the President of Harvard University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Berman is also a director of Eaton Vance Corporation and Cantel Medical Corp.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She has been a director of the Company since 2006.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Bermans experience, including having served as Vice President of Finance and Chief Financial Officer of Harvard University, has provided her with a deep knowledge of the complex financial issues faced by large institutions such as the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that the following directors, constituting a majority of our directors and nominees, are independent under our independence standards and the listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange: Lawrence S. Bacow, Ann E. Berman, Joseph L. Bower, Charles D. Davidson, Charles M. Diker, Jacob A. Frenkel, Paul J. Fribourg, Walter L. Harris, Philip A. Laskawy, Ken Miller and Anthony Welters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We refer to these directors in this Proxy Statement as our Independent Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board considered all relevant facts and circumstances and applied the independence standards described below, which are consistent with the listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange, in determining that none of our Independent Directors has any material relationship with us or our subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has established the following standards to assist it in determining director independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director would not be considered independent if any of the following relationships exists:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: during the past three years the director has been an employee, or an immediate family member has been an executive officer, of the Company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the director or an immediate family member received, during any twelve month period within the past three years, more than $120,000 in direct compensation from the Company, excluding director and committee fees, pension payments and certain forms of deferred compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the director is a current partner or employee or an immediate family member is a current partner of a firm that is the Companys internal or external auditor, an immediate family member is a current employee of such a firm and personally works on the Companys audit, or, within the last three years, the director or an immediate family member was a partner or employee of such a firm and personally worked on the Companys audit within that time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the director or an immediate family member has at any time during the past three years been employed as an executive officer of another company where any of the Companys present executive officers at the same time serves or served on that companys compensation committee; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the director is a current employee, or an immediate family member is a current executive officer, of a company that has made payments to, or received payments from, the Company for property or services in an amount which, in any of the last three years, exceeded the greater of $1 million, or 2% of the other companys consolidated gross revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering Dr. Frenkels independence, the Board noted that he serves as Chairman of JPMorgan Chase International, a unit of JPMorgan Chase & Co., where he concentrates on international strategy and global economic issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From time to time, for many years, the Company and its subsidiaries have had commercial banking and investment banking relationships with JPMorgan Chase & Co.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Frenkel has not had, and is not expected to have, any role in any current or potential future relationships between the Company or any of its subsidiaries and JPMorgan Chase & Co., or any direct or indirect material interest therein.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering Mr. Harriss independence, the Board noted that he has a majority ownership interest in certain insurance brokerage firms which, from time to time, receive brokerage commissions from insurance company subsidiaries of CNA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Harris may not participate and has not participated in the Audit Committees consideration of such related party transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All business placed with CNA by such insurance brokerage firms was pursuant to written agreements on CNAs standard forms, is typical of the products offered by CNA to its brokers and paid commissions in accordance with a schedule that is standard to CNA brokerage contracts of this type.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Harris does no participate in placements of business with CNA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Harris has informed the Company that such commissions were less than the greater of $1 million or 2% of the consolidated gross revenues of such firms during each of the last three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, such commissions totaled approximately $14,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, no information found or provided at such Internet addresses or at our website in general is intended or deemed to be incorporated by reference in this Proxy Statement.

sentences.text: Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary function of our Audit Committee is to assist our Board in fulfilling its responsibility to oversee the integrity of our financial statements, our compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, the qualifications and independence of our independent auditors, the performance of our internal audit function and independent auditors, and our systems of disclosure controls and procedures, internal controls over financial reporting and compliance with ethical standards adopted by the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Audit Committee has sole authority to appoint, retain, compensate, evaluate and terminate our independent auditors and to approve all engagement fees and terms for our independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the members of our Audit Committee is an Independent Director and satisfies the additional independence and other requirements for Audit Committee members provided for in the listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has determined that each of Ms. Berman and Mr. Laskawy is an audit committee financial expert under the rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary function of our Compensation Committee is to assist our Board in discharging its responsibilities relating to compensation of our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These responsibilities include reviewing our general compensation philosophy for executive officers, overseeing the development and implementation of compensation programs and reviewing compensation levels, including incentive and equity-based compensation, for executive officers, directors and Board committee members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee determines and approves compensation for our executive officers and administers our incentive and equity-based compensation plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the members of our Compensation Committee is an Independent Director and satisfies the additional independence requirements for Compensation Committee members provided for in the listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange and in Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominating and Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary functions of our Nominating and Governance Committee are to identify individuals qualified to become members of our Board, recommend to our Board a slate of director nominees for election at our annual meetings of shareholders and develop and recommend to our Board a set of corporate governance principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These corporate governance principles are set forth in our Corporate Governance Guidelines which can be found on our website at www.loews.com and are available in print to any shareholder who
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: requests a copy by writing to our Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the members of our Nominating and Governance Committee is an Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Code of Ethics
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a Code of Business Conduct and Ethics which applies to all of our directors, officers and employees, including our principal executive officer, principal financial officer and principal accounting officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Code can be found on our website at www.loews.com and is available in print to any shareholder who requests a copy by writing to our Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our non-management directors meet in regular executive sessions without management participation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Paul J. Fribourg, who serves as our Lead Director, presides at these meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Attendance at Meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016 there were seven meetings of our Board, six meetings of our Audit Committee, three meetings of our Compensation Committee and two meetings of our Nominating and Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, each of our directors attended at least 75% o he total number of meetings of our Board and committees of our Board on which that director served.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board encourages all directors o attend our annual meetings of shareholders, but recognizes that circumstances may prevent attendance from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of ou directors then serving attended our 2016 annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, each of our non-management directors received a cash retainer of $25,000 per quarter and an annual award of restricted stock units (RSUs) having a value of $100,000 at the date of grant under the Loews Corporation 2016 Incentive Compensation Plan (2016 ICP).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dividend equivalent amounts accrue on these RSUs (in the form of additional RSUs) as dividends are paid on the Companys Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, members of our Audit Committee received a cash retainer of $6,250 per quarter, and the committee chair received an additional $10,000 per quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Members of our Compensation Committee and Nominating and Governance Committee each also received a cash retainer of $2,500 per quarter, and the committee chairs received an additional $5,000 per quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Lead Director received an additional quarterly retainer of $5,000 per quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, for periods prior to February 10, 2016, members of our Audit Committee were paid $2,000, and members of our Compensation Committee and Nominating and Governance Committee were paid $1,000, for each committee meeting attended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our non-management directors may elect to defer some or all of their cash compensation pursuant to our Executive Deferred Compensation Plan, described under Deferred Compensation, below, and some or all of their equity compensation pursuant to our 2016 ICP.
